page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: PEEP BEHIND THE CURTAIN:One person goes off at a distance and faces the wall,the other players remain at a distance They then move quietly towards the one facing the wall.That person keeps turning round to try to catch the others moving.Anyone caught moving is sent back to the starting line.The winner is the one who touches the person facing the wall. POLO: One person stays at one end of the playground and the rest go to the other end.The single person thinks of a colour. The group also decide on a colour and a caller calls it. When the correct colour is called the person who has 'it'and the caller run from one end of the playground to the other. The winner is the one who reaches the starting point first and shouts 'POLO'.
